title: Electric potential - V at origin from line charge

content.description: A positive charge <math alttext="positive uppercase Q" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></math> is uniformly distributed within a very thin nonconducting cylinder of length <math alttext="L" overflow="scroll"> <mi>L</mi> </math>. The cylinder is placed along the <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis in the region <math alttext="x sub 0 less than x, less than x sub 0, end sub, plus L" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>L</mi></math>, as shown in the figure.
content.question: What is the electric potential at the origin?

choices.label: <math alttext="k times the fraction uppercase Q over 2, end fraction, times open parenthesis, the fraction 1 over x sub 0, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over x sub 0, end sub, plus L, end fraction, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="k times the fraction uppercase Q over L, end fraction, times the natural log of open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator x sub 0, end sub, plus L, and denominator x sub 0, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>L</mi></mrow><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="k times the fraction uppercase Q over L, end fraction, times the natural log of open parenthesis, the fraction L over x sub 0, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>L</mi><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>
<math alttext="k times the fraction uppercase Q over x sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="k times the fraction uppercase Q over L, end fraction, times the natural log of open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator x sub 0, end sub, plus L, and denominator x sub 0, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mi>L</mi></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>L</mi></mrow><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
